paper_abstract: The inverse problem of coupled static thermo-elasticity in which one has to determine the thermo-elastic stress state in a body from displacements and temperature given on a subset of the boundary is considered. A regularized method of fundamental solutions is employed in order to find a stable numerical solution to this ill-posed, but linear coupled inverse problem. The choice of the regularization parameter is based on the L-curve criterion. Numerical results are presented and discussed. (C) 2014 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The method of fundamental solutions for an inverse boundary value problem in static thermo-elasticity
